# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. For this remarkable experience, I'm extending an exclusive offer of $150 to you today. This price includes free shipping and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
